price: Enti wͻde nneεma a wͻmmͻ hwee, na yεbͻͻ wͻn no abata (Nyankopͻn) ho?
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
